name: Shuu's Sprout Collection
description:
Shuuzaar's very own collection of quality sprouts.

This is a game made for Shuuzaar's birthday.

If you are shuu, happy birthday!

If not, more things will be revealed about the game after they had time to discover it by themself! Until then, let's keep some surprises.

GAME TIPS:

Use the mouse only.

Once you've planted a sprout, no need to stay watching over it, you can let it grow by itself on the side of your screen.
